problem.transition: We don't just treat symptoms. We restore your body's coherence.

method6d.title: The 6D Navigation System
method6d.subtitle: Six dimensions of coherence for complex clinical cases
method6d.description: Integration of Western clinical evidence with bioenergetic and functional logic. For cases where standard medicine sees 'normal' results but the patient still suffers.

dimensions.name: D1: Diagnosis
dimensions.subtitle: Physical
dimensions.description: Biochemical analysis (CRP, vitamin D, cortisol), HRV variability, structural-movement assessment. For patients with 'normal' results but persistent symptoms.

dimensions.name: D2: Dysfunction
dimensions.subtitle: Bioenergetic
dimensions.description: Correction of breathing and movement patterns. Myofascial release, postural correction. Specifically for fibromyalgia and neuropathic pain.

dimensions.name: D3: Disconnection
dimensions.subtitle: Emotional
dimensions.description: Restoring brain-body connection. Coherent breathing (5-6 cycles/min), vagus activation. For psychosomatic cases and chronic stress.

dimensions.name: D4: Direction
dimensions.subtitle: Mental
dimensions.description: Biochemical foundation and nutrition. Personalized anti-inflammatory diet, nutraceuticals (D3+K2, magnesium, omega-3). Circadian rhythm optimization.

dimensions.name: D5: Development
dimensions.subtitle: Social
dimensions.description: Psychological reprogramming. Pain Neuroscience Education, ACT, cognitive therapy. For patients with 10+ year history of chronic pain.

dimensions.name: D6: Depth
dimensions.subtitle: Integration
dimensions.description: Integrating changes into life. Rituals, mindful movement, existential reevaluation. Relapse prevention and long-term stability.

items.question: Who is Medicine of Coherence for?
items.answer: For patients with complex cases where standard diagnostics show 'normal' results but symptoms persist. Especially for fibromyalgia, neuropathic pain, multi-system dysfunction, and psychosomatic cases.

items.question: What results can I expect?
items.answer: Our patients with 10+ year history of chronic pain achieve 70-85% symptom reduction. Results depend on case complexity and your engagement in the process.

items.question: How does 6D diagnostic work?
items.answer: 6D diagnostic assesses six dimensions of your health: physical, bioenergetic, emotional, mental, social, and integrative. It includes biochemical analysis, HRV measurement, and comprehensive assessment that reveals what standard tests miss.

items.question: Where do consultations take place?
items.answer: All consultations are conducted online via secure Zoom. For patients near Piešťany and Bratislava, personal contact is also possible.

items.question: Is my data secure?
items.answer: Yes, all data is processed in accordance with GDPR. We use encrypted communication and all cases are anonymized.

finalCta.title: Ready to find a solution for your complex case?
finalCta.subtitle: Start with 6D diagnostic — the first step to understanding what standard tests don't see.
